summary: To prevent one hit KO\'s from enemy archers on master difficulty
descriptionHtml:
DUEL

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2700


tweaks to arrows for DUEL

Nerf to enemy (and player) archery.

DUEL is easily my favourite combat mod, however one problem i have is on master difficulty even with the best armour around is that I can get one shotted by Archers.  Two arrows is ok with me, one is not. The damage just becomes drastically higher than any other form of enemy damage once you have high armour.  This is my attempt to bring it closer to balance. 

Also note: I use DUEL w/ ASIS among other enemy mods, if you don\'t experience overpowered archers this mod is not for you.


This mod is a personal tweak i made for balance in my own game, but i know some others may find it useful for theirs.  It comes with two seperate changes, one that edits arrows(specifically the better ones) to a lower damage, and another that edits the perk tree.

This is not made for everyone, clearly players that prefer to use a bow all the time may find these changes not to their liking. But perhaps they feel OP\'d as well and would like a little Nerf. ( you\'ll also notice i left some arrows alone.. those that just want to use the arrow tweak can then select those arrows for their character and do the full damage they always did )

I did a full playthrough after making these changes in my testmod, and it worked out pretty well.  Some forsworn or falmer could still almost one shot my character at full health, but i\'m pretty happy with it.  Archers are still to be feared, but it should cause a bit less frustration/rage.


--------------------
Arrow Tweaks
--------------------

Type : vanilla : change

Iron : 8 : 8

Steel: 10 : 9

Ancient Nord Arrow : 10 : 10

Bound Arrow : 24 : 24  ( can\'t think of any enemies who use this )

Daedric Arrow : 24 : 15

Dwarven : 14 : 11

Dwarven Centurion : 20 : 11 ( big culprit of OHKO for me )

Dwemer Bolt 1 : 10 : 5

Dwemer Bolt 2 : 15 : 10

Ebony : 20 : 15

Elven : 16 : 11

Falmer : 7 : 4  ( i was shocked it was already only 7 dmg )

Forsworn : 7 : 4

Glass : 18 : 12

Nord Hero : 24 : 24

Orcish : 12 : 11



----------------------------
Marksman perk changes
----------------------------

Overdraw - now increases in increments of 15% instead of 20% 
( just a small change, reduces the strongest perk by 25% however )

Critical shot - Reduced the extra damage of the crits/ Raised chance to crit
( big culprit of the OHKO, with this change the crits still take place,and more 

often, but it\'s chance to OHKO is lessened )

1 - 10% chance to crit increased to 20%

2 - 15% chance to crit increased to 30%
  - Extra crit damage 25% to 5%

3 - 20% chance to crit increased to 45%
  - Extra Crit damage 50% to 10%

Bullseye - Reduced paralyze chance to 5%



------------------------
other suggestions
------------------------


SPERG - perk overhaul, the heavy armor tree has a perk that reduces arrow damage by 

half.  Also has a perk to block paralysis.  I haven\'t yet tried it myself since i\'m 

worried about it breaking some of my enemy mods and I like ASIS perks added to 

enemies.
